!INDEX.html              Long index format
bootmenu/                DOS executable boot menu useful for dual-boot systems
bootpa22.zip             add Linux partition on the NT Boot loader menu
lodlin16.tgz             loads kernel from DOS w/ bzImage, initrd support
setboot-1.4.tar.gz       OS/2 setboot utility for Linux and DOS
setboot-patch.tar.gz     eliminates the message "MBR of /dev/hdb has bad magic number"
